org.gradle.api.distribution.plugins

Class DistributionPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • groovy.lang.GroovyObjectSupport
      • org.gradle.api.distribution.plugins.DistributionPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GroovyObject, Plugin<org.gradle.api.internal.project.ProjectInternal>

    @Incubating
public class DistributionPlugin
extends GroovyObjectSupport
implements Plugin<org.gradle.api.internal.project.ProjectInternal>

    A Plugin to package project as a distribution.
